extShortDesc: Končno, učinkovita razširitev za blokiranje oglasov z nizko porabo CPEja in pomnilnika.
popupPowerSwitchInfo:
Klik: onemogoči/omogoči µBlock za to stran.

Ctrl+klik: onemogoči µBlock samo na tej strani.
popupTipNoStrictBlocking: No strict blocking for this site
settingsIconBadgePrompt: Show the number of blocked requests on the icon
settingsContextMenuPrompt: Make use of context menu where appropriate
settingsAdvancedUserPrompt: I am an advanced user (Required reading)
3pParseAllABPHideFiltersInfo:
This option enables the parsing and enforcing of Adblock Plus-compatible “element hiding” filters. These filters are essentially cosmetic, they serve to hide elements in a web page which are deemed to be a visual nuisance, and which can't be blocked by the net request-based filtering engine.

Enabling this feature increases uBlock's memory footprint.
3pExternalListsHint: One URL per line. Lines prefixed with ‘!’ will be ignored. Invalid URLs will be silently ignored.
1pFormatHint: One filter per line. A filter can be a plain hostname, or an Adblock Plus-compatible filter. Lines prefixed with ‘!’ will be ignored.
rulesHint: List of your dynamic filtering rules.
rulesFormatHint: Rule syntax: source destination type action (full documentation).
whitelistPrompt: Your list of host names for which uBlock will be disabled. One entry per line. Invalid host names will be silently ignored.
logNetRequestsPrompt: Enable the logging of network requests
logNetRequestsHelp: You can inspect the details of network requests if you wish by enabling this option. The logging of network requests increases the memory footprint of uBlock. Since many users will never use this feature, it is disabled by default.
logBlockedRequestsEmpty: No blocked requests logged for this page
logAllowedRequestsEmpty: No non-blocked requests logged for this page
aboutRestoreDataConfirm:
All your settings will be overwritten using data backed up on {{time}}, and uBlock will restart.

Overwrite all existing settings using backed up data?
aboutRestoreDataError: The data could not be read or is invalid
aboutResetDataConfirm:
Vse vaše spremembe bodo izbrisane, µBlock pa se bo ponovno zagnal.

Ponastavim µBlock na tovarniške nastavitve?
docblockedPrompt1: uBlock has prevented the following page from loading:
dummy: This entry must be the last one
